overview:
An enthusiastic and proven marketing professional that will build & execute a strategy from the ground up - how can a company best leverage its assets and competitive strengths in the context of its chosen market.

Today marketing is the last frontier of gut instinct, rules of thumb and zero accountability in many organizations. What excites me is the opportunity to take this backwater and make it into a science - something with quantifiable costs, goals and impact to an organization; something that sets an example of accountability for others. A group that brings real value to an organization.
